instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: [SOLVED]Replace lcd cable A1398 retina
threads.message: Any advice on how to replace lcd lvds cable on retina 15 screen 2012?  Do I need to take off the glass? I cannot find videos on youtube.

threads.title: [SOLVED]Replace lcd cable A1398 retina
threads.message: No, same as every other retina

threads.title: [SOLVED]Replace lcd cable A1398 retina
threads.message: 5 minute job. All A1398 LCD cables are identical too. Just slide off the hinge cover.

threads.title: [SOLVED]Replace lcd cable A1398 retina
threads.message: Thanks. It is pretty easy yes. Done
